=== Contributions ===

I'm helping in the Ubuntu translations since March 2011, when I made some translations for the Ubuntu 11.04 release.
I'm currently working on the translations of the Ubuntu 11.10 release with a special attention for the <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/oneiric/+source/gcc-4.6/+pots/gcc-4.6/pt_BR/+translate|gcc-4.6 package]]</nowiki>
